column4: I am having issues creating a new user via the GUI on Gnome. This username and group existed before but my girlfriend goobered up all sorts of things so I deleted the username, group, and home dir so I could start fresh. But now when I try to create a new user with the same name it won't create it. Am I missing something?
make sure the username doesn't appear in any of /etc/passwd or /etc/group or /etc/shadow
Thanks alot! The name was still listed in the group file even though I deleted the group. Works great now. Thanks again :)
